description: The initiative focuses on fostering local governance through participatory budgets in Nantes, empowering residents to propose and decide on community projects. By prioritizing collaboration and consensus, the program encourages civic engagement and strengthens social ties. It emphasizes the importance of storytelling and organized information to facilitate the transfer of knowledge and experiences. This grassroots approach aims to create a more inclusive and responsive political landscape, ultimately enhancing community well-being and cohesion.
name: Catherine Bassani
